postReview.title: Leicester City 3-1 West Ham: Van Nistelrooy makes winning start with Foxes
postReview.description: Leicester City managed their first win in six games as Ruud van Nistelrooy got off to a winning start in Wednesday's clash with West Ham.

preReview.title: Van Nistelrooy already making changes at Leicester ahead of debut against West Ham
preReview.description: Ruud Van Nistelrooy is already making changes to help Leicester City compete ahead of his first game in charge against West Ham United.

QAData.question: Who won between Leicester City and West Ham United on Tue, 03 Dec 2024 20:15:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Leicester City won 3–1 over West Ham United on Tue, 03 Dec 2024 20:15:00 GMT.

funFacts.fallback: Jarrod Bowen created the most chances (5) in the match.
Wilfred Ndidi won the most duels (14) in the match.
Max Kilman completed the most passes (78) in the match.
Boubakary Soumaré has the least touches (49) of any outfield player.
Mohammed Kudus completed the most dribbles (6) in the match.
Mohammed Kudus is the most accurate passer (94%) in the match.
Mads Hermansen was Player of the Match with a rating of 8.9.
Facundo Buonanotte lost the most duels (18) in the match.
